metadata.title: CVE-2022-45202 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: GPAC v2.1-DEV-rev428-gcb8ae46c8-master was discovered to contain a stackoverflow via the function dimC_box_read at isomedia/box_code_3gpp.c.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
